channel.title: INall
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INall, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Waymo Cars Dangerously Halted During San Francisco Power Outage

item.title: ‘He never asks for anything’: I’m 61 with a $1.5 million 401(k). My girlfriend says I do too much for my son, 28. Is she right?
item.description: “I recently gave him $20,000 for a newer car and had him finance the rest.”

item.title: Nine People Killed, 10 Injured in Mass Shooting in South Africa

item.title: My husband and I are splitting our estate between his child and my three children. Should they get equal shares?
item.description: “We try to help all our kids when we can, yet push for self-sufficiency.”

item.title: 5 Best Monitors for the Mac Mini (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: The Mac Mini is a fantastic little computer, but you'll need one of these great monitors to complete the setup.

item.description: Does it really matter what time you go to bed? Is falling asleep quickly a good thing?

item.title: Research Reveals the Optimal Way to Optimize
item.description: The leading approach to the simplex method, a widely used technique for balancing complex logistical constraints, can’t get any better.

item.title: ‘I’m not looking to leave any money to the kids’: We’re in our 60s with $1.5 million in IRAs. Can we retire next year?
item.description: “Our current salary combined is $210,000.”

item.title: Waymo suspends service in San Francisco as robotaxis stall during blackout
item.description: Waymo suspended its SF robotaxi service on Saturday evening after a massive blackout appeared to leave many of its vehicles stalled on city streets.

item.title: ‘I don’t know how much my wife earns’: I’m 63 with $6.4 million in stocks, mostly Apple. Will I get punished on taxes?
item.description: “Each of our properties are worth over $1 million.”

item.title: ‘It’s heartbreaking’: My cousin died and her estranged husband has taken possession of her home. Can we evict him?
item.description: “The house remains in her name. He has since kicked out each of the boys one by one.”
